main event: A witness observed 5 lights in the sky over Detroit, Michigan on July 7, 1967.
interesting points: The lights appeared to disappear one at a time in the same direction., The sighting lasted 2-3 minutes., The observer described the lights as possibly reflecting off a distant object., No other shapes or objects were seen, only the lights., The witness speculated that the lights could be an artificial, self-luminous aircraft.
witness description: The witness reported that no other observers were present.
